title: 29 Christmas Gifts That Won't Break the Bank This Holiday Season
text:
Finding the right Christmas gift is never easy. Whether you’re shopping for a spouse, a parent, relative, or family friend, gift-giving never seems to get easier, no matter how long you’ve known the recipient. And if you're trying to stay under a certain budget, the gift-buying process becomes even more difficult. Because, let's be honest, the holiday season can get expensive, which makes finding cheap Christmas gifts an important holiday task.

But just because something is cheap — think $25 or less — doesn't mean it doesn't have the same appeal and wow factor as a more lavish gift. There are plenty of beauty buys, pop culture products, and must-have accessories that anyone on your shopping list would be happy to unwrap.

To get you started on the hunt, here are a handful of cheap Christmas gifts everyone is sure to love. With facial sprays for the skin-care savvy, ice-pop molds for the Star Wars lovers, and intricate backpacks for the guy on the go, these cheap Christmas gifts, all under $25, will put you and everyone you love, in the Christmas gift-giving mood.
